overview:
Fab Evans is the Art Director at 360South, a multimedia design company based in Southbank, Melbourne. 360South has a diverse range of talented programmers and designers making it a one-stop-shop for all your marketing needs. Website design and programming, graphic design and print, as well as video, photography, interactive maps and Virtual Tours.

Fab Evans has over 15 years industry experience working in London, New York, Sydney and Melbourne.
